sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS(
DWDM, NAME, ADDRESS, POSTCODE, CHARGE_PERSON, CHARGE_PERSON_PHONE, LEGAL_COMPANY, BULID_DATE, DESIGN_ABLITY, REAL_OUTPUT, BRAND, WORK_PERSON_NUM, FIXED_ASSETS, YEAR_PROFIT, KT_STYLE, TF_STYLE, FF_STYLE, TS_STYLE, GD_STYLE, ZCMCQJ, ZCMCHD, KJKCSD, SCCQGS, HCGZMGS, JJGZMGS, GZMHC_STYLE, HEIGHT, ZYLM_STYLE, ZYZH_STYLE, DBCL_STYLE, GAS_LEVEL, PYROPHORISITY, EXPLOSIVITY, CONTAIN_WATER, COMPLEX_DEGREE, WATER_THREAT, HARM_DEGREE, COAL_OCURRENCE, STABILITY, RELATIVE_COMING_AMOUNT, ABSOLUTE_COMING_AMOUNT, PYROPHORISITY_PERIOD, RECENT_MONTH_GAS_OVER_TIME, RECENT_YEAR_GAS_OVER_TIME, RECENT_COAL_PYROPHORISITY_TIME, RECENT_REPAIR_TIME, RECENT_ELEC_REPAIR_TIME, TOTAL_DUST, BREATH_DUST, TOTAL_INTAKE_AMOUNT, EFFECT_INTAKE_AMOUNT, _WATER_IN_M_A_X, _WATER_OUT_M_A_X, POOL_VOLUMN, PIPE_LENGTH, GROUND_ROOM, GROUND_EXPLOSION, GROUND_PRIMER, UNDERGROUND_ROOM, UNDERGROUND_EXPLOSION, UNDERGROUND_PRIMER, HAS_GAS_OUT_AREA, HAS_UNDEAD_FIRE, WIND_COMPLEX, TOTAL_STREET_AMOUNT, TOTAL_HARD_DEGREE, HAS_UNDER_WATER_WORK, IS_UNDER_BULIDING_WORK, IS_EFFECTED, DEAD_WOUND_NUM, SLIGHT_WOUND_NUM, BAD_WOUND_NUM, DEAD_NUM, EXPLOSION_ACCIDENT, FIRE_ACCIDENT, WATER_ACCIDENT, GAS_ACCIDENT, OTHER_ACCIDENT, ZFJ_EQUIP, JS_EQUIP, ZPSB_EQUIP, TFS_EQUIP, JCTS_EQUIP, DSSSJ_EQUIP, WSCF_EQUIP, AQJC_EQUIP, SENSOR_NUM, BSDJ_EQUIP, WJY_EQUIP, ZJQ_EQUIP, JXGYDL_EQUIP, INSPECTOR_NUM, BLASTER_NUM, DRIVER_NUM, ELECTRICIAN_NUM, SAFE_MANAGE_MAN_NUM, SAFE_MAN_NUM, HIGH_LEVEL_NUM, MIDDLE_LEVEL_NUM, LOW_LEVEL_NUM, UNDERGROUND_WORKER_NUM, PEASANT_PERCENT, MAIN_DESC, REMARK, SAVE_MAN, CONTACT_PHONE, SAVE_TIME,
ID, STATUS, CREATED, CREATE_TIME, UPDATED, UPDATE_TIME) values(
#dwdm#, #name#, #address#, #postcode#, #chargePerson#, #chargePersonPhone#, #legalCompany#, #bulidDate#, #designAblity#, #realOutput#, #brand#, #workPersonNum#, #fixedAssets#, #yearProfit#, #ktStyle#, #tfStyle#, #ffStyle#, #tsStyle#, #gdStyle#, #zcmcqj#, #zcmchd#, #kjkcsd#, #sccqgs#, #hcgzmgs#, #jjgzmgs#, #gzmhcStyle#, #height#, #zylmStyle#, #zyzhStyle#, #dbclStyle#, #gasLevel#, #pyrophorisity#, #explosivity#, #containWater#, #complexDegree#, #waterThreat#, #harmDegree#, #coalOcurrence#, #stability#, #relativeComingAmount#, #absoluteComingAmount#, #pyrophorisityPeriod#, #recentMonthGasOverTime#, #recentYearGasOverTime#, #recentCoalPyrophorisityTime#, #recentRepairTime#, #recentElecRepairTime#, #totalDust#, #breathDust#, #totalIntakeAmount#, #effectIntakeAmount#, #WaterInMAX#, #WaterOutMAX#, #poolVolumn#, #pipeLength#, #groundRoom#, #groundExplosion#, #groundPrimer#, #undergroundRoom#, #undergroundExplosion#, #undergroundPrimer#, #hasGasOutArea#, #hasUndeadFire#, #windComplex#, #totalStreetAmount#, #totalHardDegree#, #hasUnderWaterWork#, #isUnderBulidingWork#, #isEffected#, #deadWoundNum#, #slightWoundNum#, #badWoundNum#, #deadNum#, #explosionAccident#, #fireAccident#, #waterAccident#, #gasAccident#, #otherAccident#, #zfjEquip#, #jsEquip#, #zpsbEquip#, #tfsEquip#, #jctsEquip#, #dsssjEquip#, #wscfEquip#, #aqjcEquip#, #sensorNum#, #bsdjEquip#, #wjyEquip#, #zjqEquip#, #jxgydlEquip#, #inspectorNum#, #blasterNum#, #driverNum#, #electricianNum#, #safeManageManNum#, #safeManNum#, #highLevelNum#, #middleLevelNum#, #lowLevelNum#, #undergroundWorkerNum#, #peasantPercent#, #mainDesc#, #remark#, #saveMan#, #contactPhone#, #saveTime#,
#id#, #status#, #created#, #createTime#, #updated#, #updateTime#)
sqlMap.delete: UPDATE TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS SET STATUS='0' WHERE ID=#id#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT TB_ENTERPRISE.CORP_NAME AS corpName, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.DWDM AS dwdm, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.NAME AS name, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.ADDRESS AS address, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.POSTCODE AS postcode, AS totalIntakeAmount, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.EFFECT_INTAKE_AMOUNT AS effectIntakeAmount, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS._WATER_IN_M_A_X AS WaterInMAX, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS._WATER_OUT_M_A_X AS WaterOutMAX, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.POOL_VOLUMN AS poolVolumn, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.PIPE_LENGTH AS pipeLength, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.GROUND_ROOM AS groundRoom, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.GROUND_EXPLOSION AS groundExplosion, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.EXPLOSION_ACCIDENT AS explosionAccident, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.FIRE_ACCIDENT AS fireAccident, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.WATER_ACCIDENT AS waterAccident, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.GAS_ACCIDENT AS TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.ZJQ_EQUIP AS zjqEquip, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.JXGYDL_EQUIP AS jxgydlEquip, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.INSPECTOR_NUM AS inspectorNum, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.BLASTER_NUM AS blasterNum, safeManNum, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.HIGH_LEVEL_NUM AS highLevelNum, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.MIDDLE_LEVEL_NUM AS middleLevelNum, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.LOW_LEVEL_NUM AS lowLevelNum, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.UNDERGROUND_WORKER_NUM AS undergroundWorkerNum, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.PEASANT_PERCENT AS peasantPercent, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.MAIN_DESC AS mainDesc, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.REMARK AS remark, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.SAVE_MAN AS saveMan, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.CONTACT_PHONE AS contactPhone, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.SAVE_TIME AS saveTime,
TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.ID AS id, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.STATUS AS status, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.CREATED AS created, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.UPDATED AS updated, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime from TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS LEFT JOIN TB_ENTERPRISE ON TB_ENTERPRISE.ID = TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.DWDM where TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.ID=#id#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS
DWDM=#dwdm# NAME=#name# ADDRESS=#address# POSTCODE=#postcode# CHARGE_PERSON=#chargePerson# CHARGE_PERSON_PHONE=#chargePersonPhone# LEGAL_COMPANY=#legalCompany# BULID_DATE=#bulidDate# DESIGN_ABLITY=#designAblity# REAL_OUTPUT=#realOutput# BRAND=#brand# WORK_PERSON_NUM=#workPersonNum# FIXED_ASSETS=#fixedAssets# YEAR_PROFIT=#yearProfit# KT_STYLE=#ktStyle# TF_STYLE=#tfStyle# FF_STYLE=#ffStyle# TS_STYLE=#tsStyle# GD_STYLE=#gdStyle# ZCMCQJ=#zcmcqj# ZCMCHD=#zcmchd# KJKCSD=#kjkcsd# SCCQGS=#sccqgs# HCGZMGS=#hcgzmgs# JJGZMGS=#jjgzmgs# GZMHC_STYLE=#gzmhcStyle# HEIGHT=#height# ZYLM_STYLE=#zylmStyle# ZYZH_STYLE=#zyzhStyle# DBCL_STYLE=#dbclStyle# GAS_LEVEL=#gasLevel# PYROPHORISITY=#pyrophorisity# EXPLOSIVITY=#explosivity# CONTAIN_WATER=#containWater# COMPLEX_DEGREE=#complexDegree# WATER_THREAT=#waterThreat# HARM_DEGREE=#harmDegree# COAL_OCURRENCE=#coalOcurrence# STABILITY=#stability# RELATIVE_COMING_AMOUNT=#relativeComingAmount# ABSOLUTE_COMING_AMOUNT=#absoluteComingAmount# PYROPHORISITY_PERIOD=#pyrophorisityPeriod# RECENT_MONTH_GAS_OVER_TIME=#recentMonthGasOverTime# RECENT_YEAR_GAS_OVER_TIME=#recentYearGasOverTime# RECENT_COAL_PYROPHORISITY_TIME=#recentCoalPyrophorisityTime# RECENT_REPAIR_TIME=#recentRepairTime# RECENT_ELEC_REPAIR_TIME=#recentElecRepairTime# TOTAL_DUST=#totalDust# BREATH_DUST=#breathDust# TOTAL_INTAKE_AMOUNT=#totalIntakeAmount# EFFECT_INTAKE_AMOUNT=#effectIntakeAmount# _WATER_IN_M_A_X=#WaterInMAX# _WATER_OUT_M_A_X=#WaterOutMAX# POOL_VOLUMN=#poolVolumn# PIPE_LENGTH=#pipeLength# GROUND_ROOM=#groundRoom# GROUND_EXPLOSION=#groundExplosion# GROUND_PRIMER=#groundPrimer# UNDERGROUND_ROOM=#undergroundRoom# UNDERGROUND_EXPLOSION=#undergroundExplosion# UNDERGROUND_PRIMER=#undergroundPrimer# HAS_GAS_OUT_AREA=#hasGasOutArea# HAS_UNDEAD_FIRE=#hasUndeadFire# WIND_COMPLEX=#windComplex# TOTAL_STREET_AMOUNT=#totalStreetAmount# TOTAL_HARD_DEGREE=#totalHardDegree# HAS_UNDER_WATER_WORK=#hasUnderWaterWork# IS_UNDER_BULIDING_WORK=#isUnderBulidingWork# IS_EFFECTED=#isEffected# DEAD_WOUND_NUM=#deadWoundNum# SLIGHT_WOUND_NUM=#slightWoundNum# BAD_WOUND_NUM=#badWoundNum# DEAD_NUM=#deadNum# EXPLOSION_ACCIDENT=#explosionAccident# FIRE_ACCIDENT=#fireAccident# WATER_ACCIDENT=#waterAccident# GAS_ACCIDENT=#gasAccident# OTHER_ACCIDENT=#otherAccident# ZFJ_EQUIP=#zfjEquip# JS_EQUIP=#jsEquip# ZPSB_EQUIP=#zpsbEquip# TFS_EQUIP=#tfsEquip# JCTS_EQUIP=#jctsEquip# DSSSJ_EQUIP=#dsssjEquip# WSCF_EQUIP=#wscfEquip# AQJC_EQUIP=#aqjcEquip# SENSOR_NUM=#sensorNum# BSDJ_EQUIP=#bsdjEquip# WJY_EQUIP=#wjyEquip# ZJQ_EQUIP=#zjqEquip# JXGYDL_EQUIP=#jxgydlEquip# INSPECTOR_NUM=#inspectorNum# BLASTER_NUM=#blasterNum# DRIVER_NUM=#driverNum# ELECTRICIAN_NUM=#electricianNum# SAFE_MANAGE_MAN_NUM=#safeManageManNum# SAFE_MAN_NUM=#safeManNum# HIGH_LEVEL_NUM=#highLevelNum# MIDDLE_LEVEL_NUM=#middleLevelNum# LOW_LEVEL_NUM=#lowLevelNum# UNDERGROUND_WORKER_NUM=#undergroundWorkerNum# PEASANT_PERCENT=#peasantPercent# MAIN_DESC=#mainDesc# REMARK=#remark# SAVE_MAN=#saveMan# CONTACT_PHONE=#contactPhone# SAVE_TIME=#saveTime#
ID=#id# STATUS=#status# CREATED=#created# CREATE_TIME=#createTime# UPDATED=#updated# UPDATE_TIME=#updateTime#
WHERE ID=#id#

TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.MAIN_DESC AS mainDesc, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.REMARK AS remark, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.SAVE_MAN AS saveMan, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.CONTACT_PHONE AS contactPhone, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.SAVE_TIME AS saveTime,
TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.ID AS id, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.STATUS AS status, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.CREATED AS created, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.UPDATED AS updated, TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime FROM TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS LEFT JOIN TB_ENTERPRISE ON TB_ENTERPRISE.ID = TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.DWDM WHERE TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.STATUS = '1'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS LEFT JOIN TB_ENTERPRISE ON TB_ENTERPRISE.ID = TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.DWDM WHERE TB_COLLIERY_HAZARDS.STATUS = '1'
